001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FrameDecoder;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PairingEngine;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolDetector;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
014import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.Set;
020import java.util.function.Supplier;
021
022/**
023 * Executes live packet capture and protocol reconstruction, persisting message pairs in real time.
024 * <p>Runs on a single thread and is not thread-safe; call {@link #run()} once per process.</p>
025 *
026 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027 */
028public final class LiveProcessingUseCase {
029  private final PacketSource packetSource;
030  private final FrameDecoder frameDecoder;
031  private final FlowProcessingEngine flowEngine;
032  private final PersistencePort persistence;
033  private final MetricsPort metrics;
034  private final Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols;
035
036  /**
037   * Creates the live processing pipeline by wiring capture, flow assembly, and persistence ports.
038   *
039   * @param packetSource source of raw frames; must support {@link PacketSource#start()} and {@link PacketSource#poll()}
040   * @param frameDecoder converts frames to TCP segments when possible
041   * @param flowAssembler orders TCP bytes per flow
042   * @param protocolDetector detects protocols for new flows
043   * @param reconstructorFactories factories for protocol-specific byte-to-message handlers
044   * @param pairingFactories factories that convert message events to {@link MessagePair}s
045   * @param persistence sink for emitting message pairs immediately
046   * @param metrics metrics sink updated for capture, decode, and pairing events
047   * @param enabledProtocols subset of protocols to process; others are ignored
048   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
049   */
050  public LiveProcessingUseCase(
051      PacketSource packetSource,
052      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
053      FlowAssembler flowAssembler,
054      ProtocolDetector protocolDetector,
055      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories,
056      Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories,
057      PersistencePort persistence,
058      MetricsPort metrics,
059      Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols) {
060    this.packetSource = Objects.requireNonNull(packetSource, "packetSource");
061    this.frameDecoder = Objects.requireNonNull(frameDecoder, "frameDecoder");
062    this.persistence = Objects.requireNonNull(persistence, "persistence");
063    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
064    this.enabledProtocols = Set.copyOf(Objects.requireNonNull(enabledProtocols, "enabledProtocols"));
065    this.flowEngine =
066        new FlowProcessingEngine(
067            "live",
068            Objects.requireNonNull(flowAssembler, "flowAssembler"),
069            Objects.requireNonNull(protocolDetector, "protocolDetector"),
070            Objects.requireNonNull(reconstructorFactories, "reconstructorFactories"),
071            Objects.requireNonNull(pairingFactories, "pairingFactories"),
072            this.metrics,
073            this.enabledProtocols);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Runs the live loop until interrupted, persisting each reconstructed message pair.
078   *
079   * @throws Exception if any port fails during capture, decode, or persistence
080   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
081   */
082  public void run() throws Exception {
083    boolean started = false;
084    try {
085      packetSource.start();
086      started = true;
087
088      while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
089        RawFrame frame;
090        try {
091          Optional<RawFrame> maybeFrame = packetSource.poll();
092          if (maybeFrame.isEmpty()) {
093            continue;
094          }
095          frame = maybeFrame.get();
096        } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
097          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
098          break;
099        }
100
101        Optional<TcpSegment> maybeSegment = frameDecoder.decode(frame);
102        if (maybeSegment.isEmpty()) {
103          metrics.increment("live.segment.skipped.decode");
104          continue;
105        }
106
107        List<MessagePair> pairs = flowEngine.onSegment(maybeSegment.get());
108        for (MessagePair pair : pairs) {
109          persistence.persist(pair);
110          metrics.increment("live.pairs.persisted");
111        }
112      }
113    } finally {
114      try {
115        flowEngine.close();
116      } finally {
117        persistence.close();
118        if (started) {
119          packetSource.close();
120        }
121      }
122    }
123  }
124}
